title: Incorrect Calculation of Multi-Byte String Length
overview: The software does not correctly calculate the length of strings that can contain wide or multi-byte characters.
remediation: ::PHASE:Implementation:STRATEGY:Input Validation:EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:Always verify the length of the string unit character.::PHASE:Implementation:STRATEGY:Libraries or Frameworks:EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:Use length computing functions (e.g. strlen, wcslen, etc.) appropriately with their equivalent type (e.g.: byte, wchar_t, etc.)::
